Harold Budd - The Room - Amazon.com Music
Harold Budd - Abandoned Cities - Amazon.com Music
s: Beautiful vinyl pressing of an important early Budd album. On CD it was combined with The Serpent In Quicksilver, not because they go well together, I think, but because they're both relatively short albums. Having them individually on vinyl allows you to focus on the albums as separate releases.

t: Harold Budd - The Pavilion Of Dreams - Amazon.com Music
s: Harold Budd has truly crafted an extraordinary work. Regarding this particular pressing, I am pleased to report that my copy arrived in perfect condition. The vinyl is flawlessly flat and plays quietly, with an excellent mastering that reveals no perceptible distortions.

t: BUDD,HAROLD - Perhaps - Amazon.com Music
s: But that is momentary and such a minor fault as compared to the beauty of the performance. Maybe that is why he waited so long to release this recording. I don't know. But I do know that this is classic Harold Budd on solo piano and it is well worth every penny.
